TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CompiledQuery extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示快取的 LINQ to Entities 查詢。

span.span: Represents a cached LINQ to Entities query.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供查詢的編譯和快取以供重複使用。Provides for compilation and caching of queries for reuse. 就概念而言，這個類別 (Class) 包含具有數個多載的單一 `Compile` 方法。Conceptually this class contains a single `Compile` method with several overloads. 您可呼叫 `Compile` 方法來建立新委派 (Delegate) 以表示編譯的查詢。You call the `Compile` method to create a new delegate to represent the compiled query. 當使用 輸入參數和其他參數值叫用 (Invoke) 委派時，會產生某種結果 (例如 執行個體)。The delegate, when invoked with the input parameter and other parameter values, produces some result (such as an instance). 初次叫用委派時，會對查詢進行轉譯及快取。The query is translated and cached when the delegate is invoked for the first time. ## Examples 下列範例會先編譯然後再叫用接受 和 輸入參數的查詢，並且傳回訂單序列 (Sequence)，其中的訂單日期晚於 2003 年 3 月 8 日，總到期金額則少於 $300.00：The following example compiles and then invokes a query that accepts and input parameters and returns a sequence of orders where the order date is later than March 8, 2003 and the total due is less than $300.00: [!code-csharp[DP L2E Conceptual Examples#CompiledQuery5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP L2E Conceptual Examples/CS/Program.cs#compiledquery5)] [!code-vb[DP L2E Conceptual Examples#CompiledQuery5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP L2E Conceptual Examples/VB/Module1.vb#compiledquery5)]

span.span: Compiled Queries (LINQ to Entities)
